glsa.title: GNU ZRTP: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GNU ZRTP, some of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: GNU ZRTP is a C++ implementation of the ZRTP protocol.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GNU ZRTP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNU ZRTP users should upgrade to the latest version:
